title: Add JSON schema validator
body:
Implement a validator that checks if a JSON string matches a provided JSON schema.

Requirements:
- Support JSON Schema Draft 7
- Add unit tests with valid and invalid schema examples
- Expose as Terraform function with comprehensive docs
- Provide clear error messages showing which part of schema failed

title: Add date-only validator
body:
Create a validator for date strings without time components (YYYY-MM-DD format).

Tasks:
- Validate date format and ranges (e.g., month 1-12, day appropriate for month)
- Support configurable date format patterns
- Add min_date and max_date optional constraints
- Include examples for birthdate validation

title: Add time-only validator
body:
Implement a validator for time strings without date components (HH:MM:SS format).

Requirements:
- Support 12h and 24h formats
- Optionally validate seconds and milliseconds
- Provide timezone support
- Add examples for schedule/cron-like validations

title: Add cron expression validator
body:
Create a validator for cron expression strings.

Features:
- Support standard 5-field and extended 6-field (with seconds) cron syntax
- Validate ranges, steps, lists
- Provide descriptive error messages for invalid expressions
- Include AWS EventBridge schedule expression support

title: Add duration validator
body:
Implement a validator for duration strings (e.g., '2h30m', '1d', '500ms').

Tasks:
- Support Go duration format and ISO 8601 duration format
- Add optional min/max duration constraints
- Validate unit combinations
- Provide examples for timeout and TTL validations

title: Add past_datetime validator
body:
Create a validator ensuring datetime is in the past.

Requirements:
- Compare against current time at validation
- Support optional offset (e.g., must be at least 24h in past)
- Handle timezone considerations
- Add examples for audit log timestamps

title: Add future_datetime validator
body:
Implement a validator ensuring datetime is in the future.

Tasks:
- Compare against current time at validation
- Support optional offset (e.g., must be at least 1h in future)
- Handle timezone considerations
- Provide examples for scheduled events

title: Add timezone validator
body:
Create a validator for timezone identifiers (IANA/Olson database).

Features:
- Validate against standard IANA timezone database
- Support both full names (America/New_York) and abbreviations (EST)
- Add examples for multi-region deployments

title: Add credit card expiry validator
body:
Implement validator for credit card expiry dates (MM/YY or MM/YYYY).

Requirements:
- Validate format and ensure date is not in the past
- Support both 2-digit and 4-digit years
- Handle month validation (01-12)
- Provide clear error messages

title: Add ISBN validator
body:
Create a validator for ISBN-10 and ISBN-13 book identifiers.

Tasks:
- Support both ISBN-10 and ISBN-13 formats
- Validate check digits
- Handle hyphens and spaces in input
- Add comprehensive test coverage

title: Add ISSN validator
body:
Implement a validator for ISSN (International Standard Serial Number).

Features:
- Validate 8-digit ISSN format
- Check the check digit
- Support hyphenated format (XXXX-XXXX)
- Include examples for journal/periodical metadata

title: Add EAN/UPC barcode validator
body:
Create validators for EAN-8, EAN-13, UPC-A, and UPC-E barcodes.

Requirements:
- Support multiple barcode formats
- Validate check digits
- Provide format-specific error messages
- Add examples for product catalog validation

title: Add IBAN validator
body:
Implement validator for International Bank Account Numbers.

Tasks:
- Validate IBAN format and mod-97 check
- Support country-specific length validation
- Handle spaces in input
- Provide country code validation

title: Add BIC/SWIFT code validator
body:
Create a validator for BIC/SWIFT bank codes.

Features:
- Validate 8 or 11 character format
- Check country code and bank code
- Support both BIC8 and BIC11
- Add examples for payment processing

title: Add SSN validator
body:
Implement US Social Security Number validator.

Requirements:
- Validate format (XXX-XX-XXXX)
- Check against known invalid ranges
- Support both hyphenated and non-hyphenated input
- Include privacy/security best practices in docs

title: Add VAT number validator
body:
Create a validator for EU VAT numbers.

Tasks:
- Support country-specific VAT formats
- Validate check digits where applicable
- Handle prefix validation (e.g., GB, DE, FR)
- Provide comprehensive country coverage

title: Add latitude/longitude validator
body:
Implement validators for geographic coordinates.

Features:
- Validate latitude (-90 to 90) and longitude (-180 to 180)
- Support decimal degrees and DMS formats
- Add precision validation
- Include examples for location-based resources

title: Add color validator
body:
Create a validator for color codes (hex, RGB, RGBA, HSL).

Requirements:
- Support multiple color formats
- Validate hex codes (#RGB, #RRGGBB, #RRGGBBAA)
- Validate RGB/RGBA value ranges
- Add examples for UI/design configurations

title: Add file extension validator
body:
Implement a validator for file extensions.

Tasks:
- Accept list of allowed extensions
- Case-insensitive matching
- Support with or without leading dot
- Add examples for S3 key validation

title: Add MIME type pattern validator
body:
Extend mime_type validator with pattern matching (e.g., 'image/*').

Features:
- Support wildcard patterns
- Add category validation (image, video, audio, etc.)
- Validate parameters (charset, boundary)
- Include comprehensive media type examples

title: Add Kubernetes resource name validator
body:
Create validator for Kubernetes resource names (RFC 1123 DNS subdomain).

Requirements:
- Max 253 characters
- Lowercase alphanumeric, hyphens, dots
- Must start/end with alphanumeric
- Add examples for K8s Terraform modules

title: Add Kubernetes label validator
body:
Implement validators for K8s label keys and values.

Tasks:
- Validate key format (optional prefix + name)
- Validate value constraints
- Check length limits
- Support annotation validation

title: Add Docker image tag validator
body:
Create a validator for Docker image tags.

Features:
- Validate tag format restrictions
- Check length limits (max 128 chars)
- Support registry/repository prefixes
- Add examples for container deployments

title: Add SemVer constraint validator
body:
Extend semver validation to support constraint expressions.

Requirements:
- Support npm-style semver ranges (^, ~, >, <, etc.)
- Validate constraint syntax
- Add version compatibility checking
- Include examples for dependency management

title: Add environment name validator
body:
Implement a validator for environment names (dev, staging, prod, etc.).

Tasks:
- Accept configurable list of valid environments
- Case-insensitive matching
- Support environment hierarchies
- Add examples for multi-environment setups

title: Add ASN (Autonomous System Number) validator
body:
Create a validator for BGP Autonomous System Numbers.

Features:
- Support 2-byte ASN (1-65535)
- Support 4-byte ASN
- Validate reserved ranges
- Add examples for network infrastructure

title: Add VLAN ID validator
body:
Implement a validator for VLAN identifiers (1-4094).

Requirements:
- Validate range (1-4094, excluding reserved)
- Support VLAN ID lists and ranges
- Check for conflicts
- Add examples for network segmentation

title: Add country code validator
body:
Create a validator for ISO 3166-1 country codes.

Tasks:
- Support alpha-2, alpha-3, and numeric codes
- Validate against current ISO 3166-1 list
- Handle deprecated codes
- Add examples for multi-region configurations

title: Add language code validator
body:
Implement validator for ISO 639 language codes.

Features:
- Support ISO 639-1 (2-letter) and ISO 639-2 (3-letter)
- Validate language-region combinations (en-US)
- Support IETF BCP 47 language tags
- Include i18n use case examples

title: Add currency code validator
body:
Create a validator for ISO 4217 currency codes.

Requirements:
- Validate 3-letter alphabetic codes
- Support numeric codes
- Check against active currency list
- Add examples for pricing configurations

title: Add semantic versioning comparison function
body:
Extend semver support with comparison capabilities.

Tasks:
- Add semver_greater_than function
- Add semver_less_than function
- Support version range checking
- Include upgrade path validation examples

title: Add percentage validator
body:
Implement a validator for percentage values.

Features:
- Support 0-100 range by default
- Allow custom ranges
- Handle decimal precision
- Add examples for quota/threshold validations
